item.title: Hugo Blog CheatSheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Create new post hugo new posts/new.md Add a picture Basic markdown ![<alt name](< The route start from static folder>) hugo build-in shortcut –> figure (src is start from static folder) \{\{< figure src="" title="" >}} Add a reference link Documentation of ref and relref 1 2 \[Neat](\{\{< ref "blog/neat.md" >}}) \[Who](\{\{< relref "about.md#who" >}}) Theme feature This theme extended short code. See Theme Documentation - Extended Shortcodes
